name: These Tired Bones
description:
In my submission for Trijam 152, you are an undead wizard that is tired of constantly being chased by the soldiers looking to slay you. Fortunately, you have a few spells up your musty sleeves. Summon mountains to block the way, laydown skeletons to slow down and ward off enemies, and finally, shoot lightning bolts to smite the pesky heroes!

WSAD to move, scroll to cycle through spells, and left-click to cast. The goal is to just stay alive!

The spirit of Trijam is to finish a project in 3 hours. Unfortunately, I needed a little extra time to get this to a stopping point. My final time was 3:41.

I brought in Matt Walkden's tileset, although I didn't use it nearly to its full potential.

I also used Pipoya's Free RPG character sprites. 

For the animated text, I used Febucci's Text Animator for Unity.

Everything else was by my own hand, or part of my 'standard' Unity setup.
